Nexlit was the leader of cattle-raider tribe of xvarts of the Cloud Peaks area west of Nashkel in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Nexlit the Xvart was armed with a simple short sword.
As of 1368 DR, Nexlit led his tribe to raid, kill, and capture cows from the local farmers. One such raid was led to the Lonely Peaks where Nexlits xvarts attempted to massacre Hulriks bovine companion. Nexlit believed that his tribe was protected by Ursa the cave bear who resided nearby. He called the bear kind however, Ursa felt no particular kinship with the diminutive humanoids and was likely to rend them as it was to rend any adventurers trying to stop xvart cattle raids.
